images.description: A two-story traditional mountain house with a dark brown gabled roof and top facade, and a recently renovated white ground floor facade. The house is surrounded by green grass and dense forest, with a partly cloudy sky overhead. A person is visible standing near the entrance.
images.suggested_usage: Use in the 'References' or 'Projects' section to showcase a completed renovation project, specifically for older or traditional style buildings in a natural setting. Could also be used in a 'Services' section related to facade renovation or general building work.

images.description: A newly renovated two-story house with a white facade and a dark grey tiled pitched roof, featuring modern dark-framed windows. Cars are parked on the street in front of the house, and a modern fence with a gate is visible on the right. The sky is clear with a warm, late afternoon light.
images.suggested_usage: Ideal for a 'Projects' or 'References' section to highlight a completed renovation project focusing on facade work, roofing, and general residential building transformation. Could also be used as a hero image for services related to residential construction or modern renovations.
